content:
Zinc Ingot (Kaskut) prices are stable today despite minor fluctuations in LME. Demand remains steady in the automotive die-casting sector. ADC12 is showing a slight upward trend due to holiday season logistics pressure.

Key Takeaway: Buy now to lock in prices before next week's anticipated jump.

Important update for all buyers: The government has announced new regulations regarding secondary metal scrap import. This may affect our raw material costs starting next month. We advise clients to place larger orders this week to utilize current stock pricing.

Warning: Expect short-term price volatility.

सभी खरीदारों के लिए आज का बाजार अपडेट: एल्युमीनियम ADC12 सिल्लियों की आपूर्ति श्रृंखला अब सामान्य है। त्यौहारी मांग के कारण कीमतें उच्च बनी हुई हैं, लेकिन हम नए ऑर्डर के लिए 7 दिन की डिलीवरी का समय दे रहे हैं।
